name: Lighthouse Keeper (itch) (GazottoGM)
description:
the commands are in the tutorial part of the menu.

Press F for fullscreen.

And yes, this game is hard.

I hope you have fun, or get mad trying to escape.

A mix between metroidvania and survival horror. A game where light is your greatest weapon and you need to find a way to escape this base invaded by monsters of the night.

Contains music ©2020 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io)
